# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: How have the information systems used at Song affected the duties of check-in agents and flight attendants?

Відповідь: The introduction of information systems at Song has changed the way check-in agents and flight attendants interact with passengers. Agents are now able to quickly access passenger information and perform check-in duties more efficiently and accurately. Flight attendants can use their electronic devices to make sure all the necessary requirements for flight operation have been met and to quickly respond to any passenger concerns. This helps streamline the overall process, allowing flight attendants and check-in agents to provide an improved customer service experience.
